text: Alikash is a village in Kamrup district of Assam, situated on the south bank of the Brahmaputra River.Nearby major towns are Boko, Bijoynagar and Chaygaon. ==Transportation== Alikash is connected to nearby towns through National highway 17. ==See also== * Alupati ==References== Category:Villages in Kamrup district
title: Alikash
